snippet.title: Making a Vampire Survivors-like Game for the Playdate (ft. davemakes)
snippet.description:
I partnered up with davemakes (developer of the Playdate Season 1 game Executive Golf DX) to make a survivors-like game for the Playdate! This project has been almost 3 months in the making, so I hope you enjoy :)

Get the game here: https://squidgod.itch.io/core-fault
Check out Mixolumia!: https://www.mixolumia.com/
Twitter Thread: https://twitter.com/davemakes/status/1090077970968936448

Follow Dave on Twitter: https://twitter.com/davemakes
Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/SquidGodDev

Patreon supporters get the source code for ALL my games (including this one). Support my channel so I can make more content like this :)
https://www.patreon.com/squidgoddev
Join my Discord!: https://discord.gg/kDM8RU4aFt

Want to learn how to make games for the Playdate?
Learn how to code as a complete beginner with my book: https://squidgod.itch.io/lua-for-game-development
Playlist of my tutorials: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLlMPQvEA0GZPOuKJyhSr3Ra0vrpCiBTnb

I get my music from Epidemic Sound: https://share.epidemicsound.com/njknzw
